Wine Down Wednesday
Wednesday, November 1, 2023
5:30 PM
6:30 PM
Google Calendar
ICS
Join us in the Owl Cafe Wine Room to enjoy a selection of fine wines and light bites.
Featured Wines:
Argyle Brut Rosé 2020
Brohard Sancerre 2022
Coupe Roses Rosé 2022
Lemelson ‘Thea’s Selection’ Pinot Noir 2021
Markham ‘The Alrtuist’ Red Blend 2018
$30 per person, must be 21+

Wine Down Wednesday
Wednesday, December 6, 2023
5:30 PM
6:30 PM
15 Avenue D
Apalachicola
32320
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Join us every first Wednesday of the month for a wine tasting and light bites. $30 per person, 21+ only. No need to RSVP, come and go as you please! But do make plans to stay after to enjoy a meal with us!
Featured Wines:
May Georges Crémant de Loire Brut Sparkling, NV
2021 Pra Otto Soave, Veneto, Italy
2022 Peju Sauvignon Blanc, North Coast, California
2023 George Duboeuf Beaujolais Nouveau, Beaujolais, France
2021 Alexana Terroir Series Pinot Noir, Willamette Valley, Oregon
2021 Peju Cabernet, Napa Valley, California

Hemingway Happy Hour
Thursday, March 14, 2024
5:00 PM
7:00 PM
15 Avenue D
Apalachicola
32320
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Join us at The Tap Room for a Hemingway-approved Rum tasting with Billy Dunn representing Papas Pilar. Sample all Pilar Rums and Rye whiskeys along with Hemingway-inspired craft cocktails.
$8 Cocktails
Hemingway Daiquiri
with Pilar Blonde Rum
Rum Old Fashioned
with Pilar Dark Rum in Sherry Cask
Perfect Manhattan
with Hemingway Rye whiskey
Papa’s Porch Pounder

Hemingway Happy Hour: Meet the Makers
Thursday, August 1, 2024
4:00 PM
6:00 PM
15 Avenue D
Apalachicola
32320
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Come join us for a fun and laid-back evening at our Hemingway Happy Hour Meet the Makers event! Get to know the talented makers behind Papa's Pilar Rum & Hemingway Whiskey while sipping on samples and enjoying refreshments.
7th Generation Master Distiller Ron Call and sons Jacob & Clayton will be mingling with the crowd, available for questions and will be signing bottles available for purchase! So, join the fun to learn more about the inspiration behind their iconic libations. Whether you're a long-time fan or new to the brand, we can't wait to see you there!
Tickets available for purchase: $30 Advance or $40 at Door |
PURCHASE ONLINE

Owl-O-Ween Party
Friday, October 27, 2023
11:00 AM
11:45 PM
Google Calendar
ICS
Celebrate the spooky season with a hooting good time at the Owl Cafe and The Tap Room!
We'll be offering drink specials, live music, paint-your-own trick-or-treat bags, plus a costume contest at The Tap Room!
Owl Café:
4-7:30 PM | Paint your own Trick-or-Treat Bag
All-Day Drink Specials
Live Music
The Tap Room:
7 PM | Costume Party
10:30 PM | Costume Contest (Grand Prize: 2-night stay at the Gibson Inn!)
Drink Specials: $5 Bobbing for Apples Punch | BOGO Highballs | 1/2 Priced Forgotten Coast Brewing Co.
